{"step_by_step_thinking": "Tisagenlecleucel is a medication indicated for the treatment of B-cell lymphomas, including B-cell precursor acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) and diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL), as mentioned in Document [0], Document [2], and Document [3].
